src:
宇野８位、ジャンプミス響く…シニアＧＰで初めて表彰台逃す

02 Nov 2019, 15:18

　フィギュアスケートのグランプリ（ＧＰ）シリーズ第３戦、フランス杯は２日、グルノーブルで男子フリーが行われ、ショートプログラム（ＳＰ）４位の宇野昌磨（トヨタ自動車）は、ジャンプのミスが響いて１３６・７９点の９位にとどまり、合計２１５・８４点で８位だった。ファイナルを含め、宇野がシニアのＧＰで表彰台を逃すのは１３戦目で初めて。
　ＳＰ首位で世界選手権２連覇中のネーサン・チェン（米）が１９４・６８点を挙げてフリーも１位となり、合計２９７・１６点で優勝した。第１戦のスケートアメリカに続きＧＰ２連勝で、ファイナル進出を決めた。（時事）
text:
Uno 8th, jump mistake sounds ... missed the podium for the first time in senior GP

02 Nov 2019, 15:18

On the 2nd round of the Grand Prix (GP) series of figure skating, the French Cup will be free for men in Grenoble on the 2nd, and Masama Uno (Toyota Motor), which is 4th in the short program (SP), will be affected by a jump mistake.・ Remained 9th with 79 points and 8th with a total of 215.84 points. This is the first time that Uno missed the podium in the senior GP, including the final, in the 13th race.
】 Nathan Chen (USA), who has won the SP championship and won the World Championship for the second time in a row, raised 194.68 points and became the first free player, winning a total of 297.16 points. Following the first round of Skate America, we decided to advance to the final with two consecutive GP wins. (Current events)
